subject: Ice Dancing
Ice Skating
Olympic Games (2014)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Meryl Davis and Charlie White, the reigning Olympic silver medalists in ice dancing, are the sole Americans favored to win gold in Sochi in the four traditional skating events.
snippet: Meryl Davis and Charlie White, the reigning Olympic silver medalists in ice dancing, are the sole Americans favored to win gold in Sochi in the four traditional skating events.
